column5: The Vineyard B&B at Lost Creek Ranch is a peaceful, intimate, and luxurious boutique bed and breakfast nestled in the Central Texas Hill Country, just 45 minutes west of Austin. Situated on more than 3.2 acres, this property includes an incredible 2-acre Shiraz vineyard. This elegant B&B is located just minutes from Lyndon B. Johnson Lake, shopping, and dining destinations.  The Shiraz Room is located on the second floor overlooking the southern side of the vineyard.
